string-array.name: bucket_list
string-array.item: Watch the fireworks at an iCubs game
Tour the Terrace Hill governor’s mansion
Take a class at the DSM Art Center
Order a crab rangoon pizza and chinese cheese sticks at Fong’s

string-array.name: completed_tasks
string-array.item: Talk to a docent at the Salisbury House
Follow the rules of Das Boot at Hessen Haus
Cheers beers at El Bait Shop
Half-price pizza and Peroni beer night a Centro

string-array.name: todo_tasks
string-array.item: Try a Chicken shwarma and Lebanese specialty drink at Open Sesame
Order a daring burger and spiked shake at Zombie Burger + Drink Lab
Try a French pastry at La Mie
Walk along the Principal River Walk
Bring a bike and beer to the high trestle trail
